items.question: What is Book Tailor?
items.answer: Book Tailor lets you create a fun, personalized book with a chosen 'author.' Just answer a few questions, and our AI generates a unique, custom book with a professional cover and author details—perfect for a funny, one-of-a-kind gift!

items.question: How does it work?
items.answer: First, you’ll take a quick quiz about the author's hobbies, interests, and profession. The 'author' can be you, a friend, a family member, or anyone you choose. Based on your answers, our AI suggests book ideas, and you pick your favorite. Then, upload a photo of the 'author' and choose a cover design. Our AI generates a full-length book, which is printed and shipped to you!

items.question: How long is the book?
items.answer: Each book is 250 pages, filled with AI-generated content based on your quiz answers.

items.question: Can I see the book before it’s printed?
items.answer: Yes! You'll get a preview of the cover and table of contents before placing your order.

items.question: Can I edit the content?
items.answer: No, the AI generates the book based on your quiz answers, and manual editing isn't available.

items.question: How long does it take to receive my book?
items.answer: Once your order is placed, it typically takes 7-14 business days for printing and shipping.

items.question: Can I return or cancel my order?
items.answer: Since each book is custom-made, we do not accept cancellations or returns once production starts. However, if your book arrives damaged or with printing defects, we’ll replace it or issue a refund. For more details, visit: https://book-tailor.vercel.app/returns.
